note.p: Birth: Bovenplaats farm, near Riebeek West, Malmesbury district of Cape Colony [now in South Africa], Africa (24 May 1870)
Death: On his farm, Irene, near Pretoria, South Africa (11 September 1950)
Obituaries: Obituary Notices of Fellows of the Royal Society 1952-1953 vol 8 pp 271-273, plate, by Waverley
